Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Relates to establishing additional state aid to certain merged public library systems
Summary: Creates additional state aid for public library systems which merge after January 1, 2022; provides formulas for increased aid based upon the number of library systems which result from mergers and the expanded geographic areas to be served by merged systems; requires a report on the impact of the merger.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to additional state aid to public library systems merged after January 1, 2022
